## hpr0481 :: Mashpodder

 Ken Fallon talks about Mashpodder.
Some useful links:

baspodder homepage: https://lincgeek.org/bashpodder
mashpodder homepage: https://code.google.com/p/mashpodder/
Linux Reality Podcast: https://www.linuxreality.com/
Spudshow: https://spudshow.libsyn.com/


The Ogg Vorbis version of this show can be found courtesy The Bad Applez --> download hpr0481.ogg
